verses.name: Revelation 21:7
verses.text: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

verses.name: Revelation 21:8
verses.text: But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.

verses.name: Revelation 21:9
verses.text: And there came unto me one of the seven angels which had the seven vials full of the seven last plagues, and talked with me, saying, Come hither, I will shew thee the bride, the Lamb’s wife.
